```{r}
# Load libraries
library(leaflet)
library(dplyr)

# Read data
stations <- read.csv("bike_numbers.csv")

# Define size and color functions

# & for setting range
# && if vector and want overall TRUE/FALSE not TRUE/FALSES the length of the vector

get_marker_color <- function(num_bikes_available) {
  if (num_bikes_available <= 12) {
    return("red")
  } else if (num_bikes_available >12 & num_bikes_available <= 20) {
    return("orange")
  } else {
    return("green")
  }
}

get_marker_size <- function(num_bikes_available) {
  return(num_bikes_available * 10)  # Example scaling
}


# Create leaflet map
leaflet(stations) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addCircles(
    lng = ~longitude,
    lat = ~latitude,
    radius = ~get_marker_size(num_bikes_available),
    color = ~get_marker_color(num_bikes_available),
    stroke = FALSE,
    fillOpacity = 0.5
  )

```
